title: Executive Order 5301-Extension of Trust Period on Certain Allotments Made to Indians of the Crow Reservation, Montana
content: It is hereby ordered, under authority contained in section 5 of the act of February 8, 1887 (24 Stat. 388-389), that the trust period on allotments made to Indians of the Crow Reservation in Montana, which period expires during the calendar year 1930, be, and is hereby extended for a period of ten years, with the exception of the following:
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5301-Extension of Trust Period on Certain Allotments Made to Indians of the Crow Reservation, Montana Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/276915
